Description:
The code uses a data representation that relies on low-level
					data representation or constructs that may vary across different processors,
					physical machines, OSes, or other physical components.

Extended_Description.xhtml:p: This issue makes it more difficult to maintain and/or port the product, which indirectly affects security by making it more difficult or time-consuming to find and/or fix vulnerabilities.  It also might make it easier to introduce vulnerabilities.

Submission.Submission_Comment: Entry derived from Common Quality Enumeration (CQE) Draft 0.9.
